TEXT.English: %s1 Era
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 Era

TEXT.English: Enable NJAGC
TEXT.Chinese: Enable NJAGC

TEXT.English: When checked, the game clock is displayed using TheLopez's NJAGC mod.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the game clock is displayed using TheLopez's NJAGC mod.

TEXT.English: Display Era
TEXT.Chinese: Display Era

TEXT.English: When checked, the current era is displayed to the left of the research bar.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the current era is displayed to the left of the research bar.

TEXT.English: Use Era-Related Colors
TEXT.Chinese: Use Era-Related Colors

TEXT.English: When checked, the game date and era are displayed using a color for each era.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the game date and era are displayed using a color for each era.

TEXT.English: Ancient Era
TEXT.Chinese: Ancient Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Ancient era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Ancient era.

TEXT.English: Classical Era
TEXT.Chinese: Classical Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Classical era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Classical era.

TEXT.English: Medieval Era
TEXT.Chinese: Medieval Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Medieval era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Medieval era.

TEXT.English: Renaissance Era
TEXT.Chinese: Renaissance Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Renaissance era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Renaissance era.

TEXT.English: Industrial Era
TEXT.Chinese: Industrial Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Industrial era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Industrial era.

TEXT.English: Global Era
TEXT.Chinese: Global Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Modern era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Modern era.

TEXT.English: Digital Era
TEXT.Chinese: Digital Era

TEXT.English: Color to use for the Future era.
TEXT.Chinese: Color to use for the Future era.

TEXT.English: Clock
TEXT.Chinese: Clock

TEXT.English: When checked, the real time is displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the real time is displayed.

TEXT.English: Completed Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Completed Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the number of turns completed is displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the number of turns completed is displayed.

TEXT.English: Total Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Total Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the total turns in the game is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the total turns in the game is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.

TEXT.English: Completed Percentage
TEXT.Chinese: Completed Percentage

TEXT.English: When checked, the completed percentage is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the completed percentage is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.

TEXT.English: Game Date and Golden Age Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Game Date and Golden Age Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the in-game date and turns left in a Golden Age are displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the in-game date and turns left in a Golden Age are displayed.

TEXT.English: Alternate Game Clock
TEXT.Chinese: Alternate Game Clock

TEXT.English: When checked, the game clock switches between two views: standard and alternate.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the game clock switches between two views: standard and alternate.

TEXT.English: Period (in seconds)
TEXT.Chinese: Period (in seconds)

TEXT.English: Select the time each view of the game clock is displayed when alternating is enabled.
TEXT.Chinese: Select the time each view of the game clock is displayed when alternating is enabled.

TEXT.English: Clock
TEXT.Chinese: Clock

TEXT.English: When checked, the real time is displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the real time is displayed.

TEXT.English: Completed Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Completed Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the number of turns completed is displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the number of turns completed is displayed.

TEXT.English: Total Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Total Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the total turns in the game is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the total turns in the game is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.

TEXT.English: Completed Percentage
TEXT.Chinese: Completed Percentage

TEXT.English: When checked, the completed percentage is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the completed percentage is displayed if Time Victory is enabled.

TEXT.English: Game Date and Golden Age Turns
TEXT.Chinese: Game Date and Golden Age Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, the in-game date and turns left in a Golden Age are displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the in-game date and turns left in a Golden Age are displayed.
